backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor defining geography models, proposals, storage mixins, and access control with various record types for US regions and user-related data.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report placeholder with no features listed.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Aggregated summaries of various frontend documentation and source files describing architecture, plans, deployment, styles, hooks, and components.
frontend/docs/ARCHITECTURE.md: Architecture document detailing Whisper’s vision, hierarchical installations, ICP canister mapping, and modular system design principles.
frontend/docs/COMPLAINT_CATEGORY_SUGGEST: Specification for backend-stored jurisdiction-level complaint categories supporting AI Secretary suggestions.
frontend/docs/DEPLOYMENT.md: Deployment guide covering prerequisites, configuration, and steps for deploying Whisper to the Internet Computer.
frontend/docs/HOMEPAGE_REDESIGN_NOTES.md: Notes on homepage redesign including permanent hero text, asset details, overlay specs, and accessibility fixes.
frontend/docs/PHASED_PLAN.md: Phased development roadmap outlining multi-stage build plan from architecture to multi-installation support.
frontend/docs/SECRETARY_NAVIGATION_HOOKS: Documentation for the Secretary navigation registry enabling feature-level routing and destination registration.
frontend/docs/SMOKE_TEST_INSTANCE_FOLLOW: Manual smoke test covering proposal creation, admin moderation, issue project workflow, task management, and regression checks.
frontend/docs/SMOKE_TEST_REGRESSION_PATC: Focused QA checklist validating regression fixes including logo rendering, hover colors, profile behavior, and navigation.
frontend/docs/STYLE_GUIDE.md: Visual style guide defining color palette, typography, and design principles for a civic-focused UI.
frontend/index.css: Empty stylesheet placeholder for global styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/public/whisper-logo-teal.svg: SVG logo featuring a teal circular emblem with white icon elements.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling SPA routing with lazy-loaded pages and a static home hero section.
frontend/src/components/common/AppErrorB: React error boundary providing a user-friendly fallback with reload support and error details.
frontend/src/components/common/HomeHeade: Header component with logo handling, SPA navigation, admin link logic, mobile menu, and identity-based UI.
frontend/src/components/common/IconBubbl: Reusable rounded icon container supporting size and color variants.
frontend/src/components/common/LoadingIn: Spinner with optional label and size variants for consistent loading UI.
frontend/src/components/common/LoginButt: Authentication button handling login/logout state, UI copy, and loading behavior.
frontend/src/components/common/UserProfi: Dropdown menu showing user avatar, profile navigation, and logout actions.
frontend/src/components/create-instance/: Form card for creating an instance with name generation, geography selection, validation, and proposal submission.
County dropdown that loads counties by state and handles selection and loading/error states.
Place dropdown that loads places by county and supports selection and error handling.
State selector that loads all states and handles selection and loading/error states.
frontend/src/components/issue-project/Is: Dialog displaying detailed issue project info with tabs for overview and tasks, using geographic and status data.
Task management UI allowing users to create and toggle tasks for a proposal, using related task mutations and showing load/error states.
frontend/src/components/proposals/Propos: Dialog showing detailed proposal info with live fetching, geography display, and optional auto-opening of the Issue Project dialog.
Section listing all proposals with loading/error handling, refresh support, and a detail dialog triggered manually or via navigation events.
frontend/src/components/secretary/Secret: Dismissible card encouraging users to open the Secretary assistant with a prompt and button.
Searchable typeahead input for selecting geographic options with keyboard navigation and loading/empty states.
Main Secretary assistant widget managing chat, discovery flow, issue reporting, geographic selection, and instance availability/creation.
Portal component that mounts the Secretary widget into a dedicated overlay root in the DOM.
frontend/src/hooks/useAccountDeletion.ts: Provides mutations for users to request account deletion and admins to process them, with query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor tied to the current identity, invalidating dependent queries when it changes.
Fetches and saves the caller's user profile with identity‑scoped caching and proper actor readiness handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useComplaintSuggestio: Fetches complaint suggestions and all complaint categories based on geographic level and search terms.
frontend/src/hooks/useCreateInstanceProp: Checks instance name availability and submits new instance proposals with validation and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentPath.ts: Tracks the current SPA route path by listening to popstate events.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Returns a debounced version of a value after a specified delay.
frontend/src/hooks/useDeleteProposal.ts: Provides a mutation to delete proposals and invalidates related moderation and proposal queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useHideProposal.ts: Provides a mutation to hide proposals and invalidates related moderation and proposal queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication, storing identity state and providing login and logout utilities.
Fetches tasks and provides mutations to create and update them with optimistic updates.
Persists React state to localStorage with SSR safety and JSON serialization.
frontend/src/hooks/useModerationItems.ts: Fetches moderation items from the backend and maps proposals into a UI-friendly shape with loading states tied to actor initialization.
frontend/src/hooks/usePreloadedImage.ts: Preloads an image URL and returns simple ready/error state, resetting when the source changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides various backend query hooks for parent checks, proposal retrieval, and admin status, all gated on actor and identity readiness.
frontend/src/hooks/useSecretaryAutoCreat: Creates a new Whisper instance proposal based on geographic parameters and updates related caches on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useSecretaryChat.ts: Manages a simple user–assistant message history and menu visibility for the Secretary chat UI.
frontend/src/hooks/useSecretaryGeography: Supplies Secretary-focused geography queries for states, counties, cities, top issues, and city-name search with caching.
frontend/src/hooks/useSecretaryInstanceA: Checks whether an instance name is already taken for given geography and bundles multi-level availability results.
frontend/src/hooks/useSecretaryNavigatio: Maintains a registry of navigable destinations with keyword search and execution callbacks.
frontend/src/hooks/useSetIssueProjectCat: Temporarily stores issue project categories in localStorage and invalidates relevant queries for UI updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useUpdateProposalStat: Mutation hook to update proposal status with validation and query invalidation on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useUSGeography.ts: React-query hooks for fetching US states, counties, and places with graceful empty-result handling and caching.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS theme and utility definitions including color tokens, dark mode, hero styling, and UI effects.
frontend/src/lib/formatProposalGeography: Helpers to format proposal geography labels, population, and display strings based on hierarchy level.
frontend/src/lib/secretaryFriendlyMessag: Generates user-friendly Secretary messages based on geography, instance existence, and common issues.
frontend/src/lib/secretaryNavigation.ts: Defines Secretary navigation options with keyword matching and utilities for deep-link creation and parsing.
frontend/src/lib/uiCopy.ts: Defines centralized UI text constants for product, hero, auth, secretary, and profile sections.
frontend/src/lib/whisperInstanceNaming.t: Provides utilities for generating, validating, and parsing Whisper-prefixed instance names based on geographic hierarchy.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app root and wraps it with query and identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDeletionRe: Admin page to view and process account deletion requests with authentication and permission checks.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminModeration: Admin moderation dashboard handling auth, access checks, and listing moderation items.
frontend/src/pages/admin/components/Mode: Renders a table of moderation items with status badges, category icons, and action confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/GeographyPage.tsx: Displays a placeholder geography page with header navigation and coming‑soon messaging.
frontend/src/pages/profile/ProfileEditPa: React page for editing a user profile, handling image upload, backend-synced fields, and locally stored fields with save/delete actions.
frontend/src/pages/profile/profileLocalS: LocalStorage helpers for storing and retrieving profile fields not yet supported by the backend.
frontend/src/pages/profile/ProfileViewPa: React page displaying the user's profile, combining backend data with locally stored fields and providing navigation to edit mode.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Empty placeholder file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/utils/assetUrl.ts: Resolves asset URLs using the app’s base path for safe deployment under nested routes.
frontend/src/utils/secretaryProjectNavig: Implements custom event-based navigation for secretary-to-project routing.
frontend/src/utils/spaNavigate.ts: PushState-based navigation helper that triggers SPA route changes.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters across query and hash routes.
frontend/src/utils/userFacingError.ts: Normalizes various error types into user-friendly messages with special handling for moderation and backend errors.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and container settings for the frontend.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current state, including schema version, issues with Caffeine draft preview, and a new documentation-related feature request. Contains project metadata, known issues, and pending fix requirements.
